name: fiyat-teklifi-desktop
description: Fiyat Teklifi Yönetim Sistemi - Masaüstü Uygulaması
author: Fiyat Teklifi

scripts.electron-dev: concurrently "cd frontend && yarn start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.electron-build: cd frontend && yarn build && cd .. && electron-builder
scripts.electron-build-win: cd frontend && yarn build && cd .. && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron-build-mac: cd frontend && yarn build && cd .. && electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron-build-linux: cd frontend && yarn build && cd .. && electron-builder --linux
